verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You called my name, reached out your hand
Restored my life, and I was redeemed
The moment you entered my life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amazing grace, Christ gave that day
My life was changed when from my shoulders
Fell the weight of my sin

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So it's with everything I am
I reach out for your hand
The hope for change
The second chance I've gained

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
On you I throw my life
Casting all my fears aside
Hoe could greater love than this
Ever possibly exist

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Consume my thoughts
As I rest in You
I'm now in love with a Saviour
Bearing the marks of His love

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
So I'll wait upon you now
With my hands released to You
Where a little faith's enough
To see mountains lift and move
And I'll wait upon you now
Dedicated to Your will
A love that never fails
